Articles.Content:
![artwork.jpg](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/70566101/artwork.jpg)

Hi all! I love graphic post production and KSP. For training and fun, im going to make some artworks based on Ksp screenshots.

So if you have some pic you want to enhance, please send me in you screenshots via msg or post right there. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Update 10.3.2015:** Please let me know in what resolution you would like your screenshots enhance to. 

**So far galery :**

1) ***One way mission***

> 
> My own screenshot.
> 
> ![Copy%20of%20ksp01REMD_original.jpg](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/70566101/Copy%20of%20ksp01REMD_original.jpg)
> 
> Larger size of artwork [there](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/70566101/final.jpg).
> 
> 

![final2.jpg](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/70566101/final2.jpg)

2) ***Duna mission, long, long ago***

> 
> [**Kerdinand**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/127273-Kerdinand) screenshot.
> 
> ![mix2.jpg](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/70566101/mix2.jpg)
> 
> Larger size of artwork [there](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/70566101/mix23.jpg).
> 
> 

![Copy%20of%20mix23.jpg](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/70566101/Copy%20of%20mix23.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-10T06:15:30Z" title="03/10/2015 06:15  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 10, 2015</time> by REMD**
  
Update

Wow! This is very nice. Do you think you could do something with this picture? ItÃ‚Â´s from my first Duna mission ever, long, long ago.

It already looks very nice in my opinion, but IÃ‚Â´m sure you can make it even better!

Sweet!

Is that the Czech flag?

I love where the KSP forums are going - it's all artwork now ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) amazing work there.

THis isn't technically a screenshot but I was wondering if you could mabye add some stars in the background, make it look like they are floating side by side in space.... mabye over a blue world with clouds. Thanks!

![3swKYZJ.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/3swKYZJ.jpg)

> 
> Wow! This is very nice. Do you think you could do something with this picture? ItÃ‚Â´s from my first Duna mission ever, long, long ago.

Thanks ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Im working on your screenshot right now ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Sweet!
> Is that the Czech flag?

Yes it is ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) from [Woopert](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/86627-Woopert) [ESA Country Flags pack](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96484-0-90-ESA-Country-Flags-v1-2?highlight=esa+flag+pack).

I live there btw.

>

> I live there btw.

Thanks for the pack!

I live in the Czech republic as well!

Amazing job man. Those rocks are beautiful!

Whenever someone *asks* to make improvements on someones screenshots, I like letting the person choose which of my pictures to improve ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif). Choose one of these screenshots if you wish to improve it.

> 
> THIS: (Bolt III)
> 
> ![wMAoccE.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/wMAoccE.jpg)
> 
> Or THIS: (Massive Jool station) - from a video of mine
> 
> ![2vcYE5d.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/2vcYE5d.jpg)
> 
> Or THIS: (Swordfish II from Cowboy Bebop)
> 
> ![bHaDOMG.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/bHaDOMG.jpg)

Thanks for the look, and best of luck, REMD. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

These look fantastic! Could you do this one?

![jXytwBR.png](http://i.imgur.com/jXytwBR.png)

I know it doesn't look like much, but if you add some Joolian cloud bands and such... It will look GREAT!

And, though these probably take quite a long time to do, if you want, could you improve this too?: http://i.imgur.com/ofv2C9v.png"]Seriously, only if you want to
Could I ask if I could have my pic in a better quality? Because itÃ‚Â´s a bit blurred on my 1920x1280 screen.
So, REMD, has there been any progress on anyone else's requests? And what about my request?

> 
> Could I ask if I could have my pic in a better quality? Because itÃ‚Â´s a bit blurred on my 1920x1280 screen.

I see. I made it for smaller resolution so it is blurry on your pc ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) (from 1400 to 1920 is a long way :/) i could sharp it little bit on 1920 rescale but it will never be good enough as original work. I have to change some notes in main page due to this.
REMD did you see my spoiler on page 1? These are looking awesome!

> 
> I see. I made it for smaller resolution so it is blurry on your pc ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) (from 1400 to 1920 is a long way :/) i could sharp it little bit on 1920 rescale but it will never be good enough as original work. I have to change some notes in main page due to this.

I'd like my request above to be in 1024 x 768. (That's my monitor resolution, since I'd like to use this as a desktop background)
